name: Guidance
description: The target gains a +1d4 bonus to Ability Checks.
buff: Target receives a +1d4 bonus to all Ability Checks for 10 turns. Requires Concentration.

name: True Strike
description: Divine a character's defences to give you Advantage on your next Attack Roll against it.
buff: Caster gains Advantage on their next Attack Roll against the target. Lasts 2 turns. Requires Concentration.

name: Hunter's Mark
description: Mark a creature as your quarry to deal an additional 1d6 Slashing damage whenever you hit it with a weapon attack. If the target dies before the spell ends, you can mark a new creature without expending a Spell Slot.
damage: Weapon attacks deal an extra 1d6 Slashing damage to the marked target
debuff: Target is marked, taking bonus damage from weapon attacks. Lasts until Long Rest. Requires Concentration. When upcast, duration extends and can be maintained without Concentration at higher levels.

name: Speak with Animals
description: Gain the ability to comprehend and verbally communicate with beasts.
buff: Caster can understand and communicate with animals until Long Rest. Ritual spell - can be cast without expending a spell slot outside combat.

name: Detect Thoughts
description: Focus your mind to read the thoughts of certain creatures while talking to them.
buff: Allows caster to read minds during dialogue, revealing lies and secrets. Lasts until Long Rest. Requires Concentration. Ritual spell - can be cast without expending a spell slot outside combat.

name: See Invisibility
description: Become able to see Invisible creatures, and possibly reveal them to others.
buff: Caster can see invisible creatures within 9m for 10 turns. Affected creatures may be revealed to all allies.
debuff: Invisible creatures within range are revealed and lose benefits of invisibility.
